flawed_nl_solution:
If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=140>>140 books.
In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 140*5 = 700 books which is the number he has now.
This means Evan will have 700+60 = <<700+60=760>>760 books in five years.
#### 760

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 140. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
